## <i class="fas fa-smile"></i> Meet Sarah

Hi, I'm Sarah, the founder of Jazz Medical Aesthetics. As a Physician Assistant with a diverse medical background, I'm passionate about helping my clients achieve their aesthetic goals.

### <i class="fas fa-road"></i> My Journey

- <i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> Originally from Buffalo, NY, now based in Stafford, VA
- <i class="fas fa-graduation-cap"></i> Undergraduate degree in Business Administration from the University at Buffalo
- <i class="fas fa-user-md"></i> PA degree from Daemen University

### <i class="fas fa-briefcase"></i> Professional Experience

- <i class="fas fa-calendar-alt"></i> 8 years in primary care
- <i class="fas fa-plane"></i> Traveling PA providing customized patient care
- <i class="fas fa-ambulance"></i> Emergency Medicine PA
- <i class="fas fa-spa"></i> Now specializing in medical aesthetics

### <i class="fas fa-question-circle"></i> Why Jazz Medical Aesthetics?

I created Jazz Medical Aesthetics to offer a unique, personalized approach to aesthetic treatments. By bringing these services directly to you, we ensure a comfortable, convenient experience tailored to your individual needs.
